example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 这麽)) (VP (VE 没) (NP-OBJ (NN 忌讳) ))) (DEV 的)) (PP (P 与) (NP (NN 棺材) )) (VP (VV 为伍)))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 不)) (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 贪) (NP-OBJ (NP (PN 它)) (QP (CLP (M 个))) (PU ――) (NP (NN 升官) (NN 发财) )))))
